skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: As a beginner in back-end development, I am focusing on learning core technologies like Node.js, Express, and databases. I’m building a strong foundation in server-side logic, API development, and database management, while continuously improving my problem-solving and coding skills.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: As a beginner in UI/UX design, I’m learning to create user-friendly interfaces and seamless experiences. I focus on understanding user needs, wireframing, prototyping, and applying design principles to ensure intuitive and visually appealing designs.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: As a beginner in Webflow development, I’m learning to build responsive, visually engaging websites with Webflow’s no-code platform. I focus on mastering design elements, animations, and CMS functionality to create user-friendly, dynamic websites.
